page.title: 20THE MEDIA IN STEWARTON
page.content: Few homes in the area do not have at least one television and many have more than one. Video recorders are now very popular too and so selective viewing becomes possible and progrommes are now watched at convenient times instead of when they are recorded.Schools find this very useful.Music centres and radios are favourites with the young. Programmes are presented from early morning till late at night. The four channels are watched. A local young man, Robin Cameron, stars in "Take The High Road" on Scottish Television and at least three work in the Glasgow studios. The local radio station often transmits from Stewarton and a few residents work with this station-on 261 channel.
